Description: Baluster sherd of Attic black-figured pottery dinos stand; exterior: three rows of incised spoked rosettes with added red on petals.
Producer name: Attributed to the Circle of: Sophilos
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1888,0601.570.e, 1888,0601.570.f, 1965,0930.807 and 1965,0930.808.
Bibliographic references: Williams 1983 / Sophilos in the British Museum (p. 13, p. 15)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 225, no. 8a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0270) (Phase 1)
